property.name: metamodelVersionPackage
property.documentation: Defines the metamodel version package name (i.e. org.andromda.metafacades.uml14, org.andromda.metafacades.um20, etc) used by this cartridge to create the generated impl package name, if left empty then the impl package will be the same as the metafacade package (therefore we default to an empty name)
